name: illuminate
effect: Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is doubled. This ability has no effect in battle.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon.
flavor_text.platinum: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon.
